note: Stores Earth occultations by the target body of the spacecraft that occur on approach to target body

fields.description: SQL ID of the parent trajectory

fields.filtering: checkbox (optional, not clear how this would be implemented
fields.description: Time that spacecraft enters into occultation relative to the Earth in days past J2000. Nullable

fields.filtering: checkbox (optional, not clear how this would be implemented
fields.description: Time that spacecraft exits occultation relative to the Earth in days past J2000. Nullable
